name: FLIR Systems
benefits: Enhanced situational awareness, night vision capabilities
functionality: Provides thermal imaging for surveillance and reconnaissance, detecting heat signatures in various environments.

name: DroneX
benefits: Real-time intelligence, reduced risk to personnel
functionality: Unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) equipped with cameras and sensors for gathering intelligence and monitoring activities.

name: Sentinel 1000
functionality: Uses sensors and cameras for monitoring borders and sensitive areas, providing alerts for unauthorized entries.

name: Tactical Edge Solutions
functionality: Mobile platform for coordinating operations, sharing intelligence, and real-time communication among units.

name: Raven
benefits: Remote operation, risk reduction in hazardous environments
functionality: Robotic vehicle for surveillance, reconnaissance, and logistics support, operated remotely to perform various tasks.

name: ShotSpotter
functionality: Acoustic sensor network that detects and locates gunfire, providing real-time alerts to law enforcement and military.

name: Smart Sensors for Battlefield Monitoring
functionality: Sensors deployed in the field to monitor environmental conditions, troop movements, and potential threats.

name: Cybersecurity IoT Solutions
benefits: Protection against cyber threats, data integrity
functionality: IoT devices equipped with cybersecurity measures to protect military networks and data from cyber attacks.

name: Portable Medical Diagnostics
benefits: Rapid medical evaluation, improved care in the field
functionality: Portable devices for diagnosing injuries and illnesses in the field, transmitting data to medical personnel.

name: Smart Wearable Tech
benefits: Improved health tracking, real-time data on troop conditions
functionality: Wearable devices that monitor vital signs, fatigue levels, and environmental conditions for soldiers in the field.
